attributes.additional_details: Due to the success of the London 2012 games, the people of Britain deserve another one. The visitors to our city loved it, the athletes loved the fans and the atmosphere generated at all venues and we showed the world how it's done. We are a sport loving nation and are ready to do it again. I would like the Government to bid for the Games again or failing that be on standby for 2016 if Rio isn't ready.
